key_reminder_en: Use the same safe question frames every time.
Memorise these frames: What do you…? / Do you like…? / Where do you…? / Who do you… with? / When do you…? / How do you…?
Ask 3–5 questions only. One follow-up is enough.
key_reminder_ar: احفظ القوالب: What do you…? / Do you like…? / Where do you…? / Who do you… with? / When do you…? / How do you…?
اسأل 3–5 أسئلة فقط. سؤال متابعة واحد يكفي.
instructions_en: Use the prompts to build questions.

prompts.WHO (with): Who do you talk to in your neighbourhood?
prompts.WHEN: When do you see your neighbours?

prompts.HOW: How do you read (book or phone)?

prompts.WHAT: What do you do to learn English?
What do you do at the weekend?
prompts.WHERE: Where do you go at the weekend?

prompts.WHAT: What do you do at a party?
prompts.WHERE: Where do you go for festivals?
prompts.WHEN: When is an important festival in your country?
